NT3D_vp_o Class Reference

NT3D_vp_o class Superclass that unifys a common interface for abstract viewport implementations and their driver dependend realisations for various window systems (viewport driver). More...

Protected Attributes

NT3D_vp_o * pVP

Detailed Description

NT3D_drv_vp_o basically provides an implementation for all the functionality or infrastructure defined by this class, which is assigned to an NT3D_abstract_vp_o which uses this infrastructure. In this context it is possible that an NT3D_abstract_vp_o can be assigned to different drivers. On the other side the abstract viewport should provide all drawing within the Draw() method for the viewport drivers, which is the only method called from the driver classes. In the other direction the abstract classes should actually avoid to call the Draw() method themselves.

Bug:
